Text.val: 15.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (FM15)
08.01.2009 GB SCR14289 extend the range to select FCI_SELLER
@Program use variables for text output to avoid translations of text controls
-- MSG15 Information on or Settlement of a Dispute
-- Also if no MESSAGE_TEXT exist, at least one row is written
to XML with "Message text" on the left side

ExpSyntax.val: 'MSG15 Information on or Settlement of a Dispute'

Text.val: ... first line with "Message text" on left side
(also if no MESSAGE_TEXT exist, at least one row is written
to XML with "Message text" on the left side)
